title: Things to Do
intro: Explore the area around our wedding venue with these fun activities and attractions.

things.title: Scenic Hiking Trails
things.description: Beautiful nature trails perfect for a morning walk or afternoon adventure.

things.title: Local Winery
things.description: Sample local wines and enjoy the vineyard views.

things.title: Historic Downtown
things.description: Charming shops, restaurants, and historic architecture.

things.title: Art Museum
things.description: Local art museum featuring regional artists and rotating exhibits.

things.title: Beach Access
things.description: Relax on the nearby beach or take a sunset stroll.

things.title: Farmers Market
things.description: Fresh local produce, artisanal goods, and live music.
